amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 401 of the bill which establishes the Climate Security Advisory Council under the Director of National Intelligence.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to strike section 401 of the bill which establishes the Climate Security Advisory Council under the Director of National Intelligence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 255 (Roll no. 490).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Chabot.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 255 (Roll no. 490).
